CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(PSCase_Overall_Health__c, "Green")), IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=00P50000005vPYv", "Green: Good"), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(PSCase_Overall_Health__c, "Amber")) , IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=00P50000005vPZ5", "Amber: Warning"), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(PSCase_Overall_Health__c, "Red")), IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=00P50000005vPZ0", "Red: Critical"),null)))
CustomField.label: Overall Health
